scripts.uglify-js: cd public/js/ && rm -f app.min.js && rm -f app.min.js.map && ../../node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs ../bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.js ../bower_components/jquery-ui/jquery-ui.js ../bower_components/angular/angular.js ../bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.js  ../bower_components/angular-animate/angular-animate.js ../bower_components/angular-strap/dist/angular-strap.js ../bower_components/angular-strap/dist/angular-strap.tpl.js ../bower_components/angular-ui-sortable/sortable.js ../bower_components/ngDialog/js/ngDialog.js ../bower_components/angularjs-toaster/toaster.js ../bower_components/angular-bootstrap/ui-bootstrap-tpls.js ../bower_components/angular-gridster/dist/angular-gridster.min.js ../bower_components/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js ../bower_components/angular-gravatar/build/md5.js ../bower_components/angular-gravatar/build/angular-gravatar.js ../bower_components/angular-xeditable/dist/js/xeditable.js ../bower_components/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.js ../bower_components/ngstorage/ngStorage.js ../bower_components/ng-file-upload-shim/angular-file-upload-shim.js ../bower_components/ng-file-upload/angular-file-upload.js *.js ./*/*.js  -o app.min.js --source-map app.min.js.map
scripts.uglify-css: rm -f public/assets/stylesheets/app.min.css && mkdir -p public/assets/fonts && cp -r public/bower_components/fontawesome/fonts/*.* public/assets/fonts && cat public/bower_components/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css public/bower_components/angular-gridster/dist/angular-gridster.min.css public/bower_components/ngDialog/css/ngDialog.css public/bower_components/fontawesome/css/font-awesome.css public/bower_components/angular-xeditable/dist/css/xeditable.css public/bower_components/angularjs-toaster/toaster.css public/assets/stylesheets/bootstrap-additions.min.css public/assets/stylesheets/style.css public/assets/stylesheets/card.css public/assets/stylesheets/dashboard.css public/assets/stylesheets/font-awesome.min.css public/assets/stylesheets/cards_style.css | node_modules/clean-css/bin/cleancss -o public/assets/stylesheets/app.min.css
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify-js & npm run uglify-css
scripts.watch: npm run uglify && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
